name: Wastelands 3: Rebooted
description:
An itch.io version of Wastelands 3: Rebooted. With the game tweaked to play at 60FPS instead of Scratch's 30FPS AND the addition of widescreen, this is the definitive way to play.

Wastelands 3: Rebooted is, you guessed it, the third game in the Wastelands series. Wastelands 1 is unavailable due to the game being straight up terrible, and Wastelands 2 is available on my profile here, just like this game. Wastelands 3 is a turret shooter based around Despair.
